title: Feedback on Friend's List
body:
Loving the new look but some things I've noticed
Friends list is something that grows on me. I'm liking how when i'm in lobby, it shows up top right too. However, one thing I dislike is how compact you guys have made it. I can't identify who is in champion select or in game or busy. I have a friend on DO NOT DISTURB and they're the same colour as the one in CHAMPION SELECT/IN GAME. It's a little annoying to mouse over every single one of your friend to know what status they are.

Can't wait to see more features added into it
